name: react-native-auto-infinite-scroll
description: - 선언 ``` import RNInfiniteScroll from 'react-native-auto-infinite-scroll'; ``` - 사용 ``` <RNInfiniteScroll     data={[{ key: '1' }, { key: '2' }, { key: '3' }, { key: '4' }, { key: '5' }, { key: '6' }, { key: '7' }]}     renderItem={({ item }) => <View style={styles.listItem}><Text>{item.key}</Text></View>}/> ```
author: davidlee
